page.title: 19SPORTS DAY.
page.content: Every year we have a School Sports Day. This takes place just before the {end of term.}All four years in the school take part. It takes about four hours to{practice}for sports day. Everyone is divided into{houses.} They have colours like red, green, blue and also yellow. We start off with the one hundred metres run. Then we have skipping for the girls. The sack race is next and the main race is the two hundred metres long run. Both boys and girls take part in the obstacle race, but in other races the boys and girls run separately. Some other events are - bean bag race, egg and spoon race, wheelbarrow and a throwing competition.
